body.p: Erratum to ‘Enoxaparin once daily vs. twice daily dosing for the treatment of venous thromboembolism in cancer patients: A literature summary’ by Amber H. Diaz, George M. Rodgers and Jeffrey A. Gilreath, Journal of Oncology Pharmacy Practice, June 2012 vol. 18, no. 2, 264–270, first published online 19 September 2011, DOI: 10.1177/1078155211412990.
The affiliation of Amber H Diaz was listed incorrectly as:
Southwest Washington Medical Center, Department of Pharmacy Services, Vancouver, WA, Canada
The affiliation is correct as follows:
Southwest Washington Medical Center, Department of Pharmacy Services, Vancouver, WA, USA
SAGE apologises to the authors and to the readers for this error.
